about_the_game:
Indianapolis is a truly versatile warrior.
Thanks to the Surveillance Radar consumable and high range of fire, this cruiser is excellent in the support role, and its effective primary armament lets you duel confidently against enemy same-tier cruisers. Also, don't forget about its increased profitability in XP and Credits!

The bundle also includes the following:
  • commander with 6 skill points
  • Port slot
  • 2500 Doubloons
  • 44x common expendable economic bonuses of four types (Credits +20%, Ship XP +100%, Commander XP +100%, and Free XP +300%)

This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Indianapolis is a truly versatile warrior.
Thanks to the Surveillance Radar consumable and high range of fire, this cruiser is excellent in the support role, and its effective primary armament lets you duel confidently against enemy same-tier cruisers. Also, don't forget about its increased profitability in XP and Credits!

The bundle also includes the following:

  • 2500 Doubloons
  • 44x common expendable economic bonuses of four types (Credits +20%, Ship XP +100%, Commander XP +100%, and Free XP +300%)

This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

name: World of Warships — Indianapolis Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.1
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
• Mostly realistic setting
• Photo-realistic depiction

Violence Against Non-Humans
• Violence is often depicted from a distance
• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")

Users Interact
• User generated content shared with others

Also, don't forget about its increased profitability in XP and Credits!
